net.minecraftforge.event

Class TagsUpdatedEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
      • net.minecraftforge.event.TagsUpdatedEvent

  • public class TagsUpdatedEvent
extends net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
    Fired on the client when NetworkTagManager has all of its tags synced from the server to the client (just after a client has connected). Fired on the server when NetworkTagManager has read all tags from disk (during a data reload). This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS On the client, this event fires on the Client Thread. On the server, this event may be fired on the Server Thread, or an async reloader thread.
